definitions.definition: a bird's horny projecting jaws; a bill.
examples: bill, nib, mandible a bird's beak

definitions.definition: the horny projecting jaw of animals other than birds, for example a turtle or squid.
a person's nose, especially a hooked one.
examples: she can't wait to stick her beak in

definitions.definition: a projection at the prow of an ancient warship, typically shaped to resemble the head of a bird or other animal, used to pierce the hulls of enemy ships.
